summary: This quest starts with a Khajiit who asks for revenge on bandits and at the end you obtain full set of golden warrior armor and weapon
descriptionHtml:
BUG LIST
WHEN YOU KILL THE BANDIT AND OBTAIN HIS SWORD IT WILL FINISH THE QUEST I WILL FIX IT BUT AT THE MOMENT I CANT SO YOU GO BACK TO FOUR SHEILDS TAVERN IN DRAGON BRIDGE OR YOU CANT GET THE SET OF ARMOR!!!!!!!!!
AND IF HE DOESNT SPEAK SAVE IT AND LOAD IT BACK UP

HOW TO START - GO TO DRAGON BRIDGE INTO FOUR SHEILDS TAVERN (INN) REMEMBER TO READ THE BUG LIST.

Requires No DLC



[ img ] http:www.google.co.ukimgres?imgurl=&imgrefurl=http%3A%2F%2Fhdwallsource.com%2Fskyrim-logo-11795.html&h=0&w=0&tbnid=HVW0-6rS7HPuDM&zoom=1&tbnh=177&tbnw=284&docid=h2K2E0-2ZOAbJM&tbm=isch&ei=QAFlU8W7EYemO7nLgcgD&ved=0CAsQsCUoAw[ /img ]


This quest starts with a Khajiit who asks for revenge on bandits and at the end you obtain full set of golden warrior armor and weapon. His brother was walking along river wood and he had 60,000 money in his pocket so they killed him someone found his body and inform a guard a letter got dispatched to Ra Larr a Khajiit warrior in the imperial army got the message sent to their camp by an imperial courier Ra larr was so upset he ran for a couple of days he was trying to get to skyrim he finally got their and found one of the bandits in helgen but he was too strong so he ran to dragon bridge hoping someone would help him!

REMEMBER TO CHECK OUT MY YOUTUBE CHANNELS

JACKTHEGAMER
https://www.youtube.com/user/jJackTheGamer

JACKTHEGAMER PLAYS SKYRIM
https://www.youtube.com/user/jackthegamerskyrim/about
author: Jack TheGamer
